docstring.long_description:
Note that if the file is not yet created, you can choose a file in the
same directory/folder.
docstring.short_description: Records audio using a local microphone.

parameters.name: file_name
parameters.description: File name of the output audio file.

parameters.name: file_path
parameters.description: The path to save the audio file in. Select a file in the directory.

parameters.name: record_length
parameters.description: How long to record in seconds.

parameters.name: chunk_size
parameters.description: The size, in samples, to record.

parameters.name: channels
parameters.description: The number of channels for the recording (e.g. 2 = left and right).

parameters.name: samples_per_second
parameters.description: Samples per second. The bitrate is this multiplied by bits_per_sample.

returns.description: Filename and path of the recording.
